informacion: UPDATE COVCOREPE..USR  SET USR_PER_TBL = 1--5 --16: USUARIO DE PRUEBAS (filtra cartera) WHERE USR_LOG_USR = 'AGUERRERO'
UPDATE CovFacopePe..OPE SET	OPE_EST_OPE = 4 WHERE OPE_NUM_OPE = 20169
UPDATE  COVCOREPE..PAR SET PAR_EST_PAR = 0 --0: DESACTIVADO	1:ACTIVADO WHERE PAR_COD_TAB = 181 and PAR_COD_PAR in (1,2,3,4,5,7,8)
SELECT * FROM COVCOREPE..PAR WHERE PAR_COD_TAB = 181 and PAR_COD_PAR in (1,2,3,4,5,7,8)
update covcorepe..mcd set MCD_ES_CLI = 1 , MCD_ES_DEU = 0 where  MCD_RUT_MCD = 20176770474
SELECT name FROM   sys.procedures WHERE  Object_definition(object_id) LIKE '%3600%'
delete from otr where otr_num_ope = 20742 delete from CovArchivosPe..archivo where img_num_ope = 20742
SELECT name, create_date, modify_date  FROM sys.objects WHERE type = 'P' ORDER BY modify_date DESC
titulo: BUSCAR PROCESO ALMACENADO ORDENADO POR FACHE MODIFICACION

informacion: SELECT PFL_FIL_USR, * FROM COVCOREPE..PFL order by 3 asc --PFL_FIL_USR = 1 --FILTRA
